title: How to make a lot of people mad at you
body:

EDIT:

Step 3:

Go into Blind pick with Friends and use this Team Comp:

{{champion:105}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:236}} 

Step 4: Be a HERETIC (Thanks for the reminder Face The Sun)

Step 5: Start stupid wars with people on boards (FUCK YOU TIDES OF BLOOD)

Step 6: talk lik dis in chat n form psts

Step 7: MORE FAN ART, be sure to reuse stuff from the past too

http://www.deviantart.com/art/LoL-Rumble-s-Revenge-396241795

Step 8: ATTACK THE SHIPS!!!

A heretic work of art. I like it.
But it's hot enough already
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Step 9: Be a little Bitch to anyone that is against your view or opinion (Remember Step 6)

OMG LEONA X DIANA IS DA BOMB WTF IS RONG WIT U, U STPID AS!

{{champion:131}} **X**{{champion:89}} 

_(joke, Riot don't remove please)_
Step 10: Defend Riot's decisions.
That's Step 11 Friend... and they really are trying their best
i do not ship yuri i dont ship scissoring have people been taught at a young age not to run with scissors?

Sona Fortune is the Only Ship

Cause Sona is Bae

i mean, i cant argue there


http://pre11.deviantart.net/17fd/th/pre/f/2012/267/2/4/arcade_sona_by_harapeko-d5fna4j.png <3

I trying to get my Mastery 7 with her
Fortune getting lonely in the 7 club

You forgot the most important detail: Discuss the game's balance like you know everything about it and you're completely right all the time, disregard other people's opinions and state yours as a fact.
damn ninjas cutting onions

That {{champion:117}}  and {{champion:18}}  image...

http://imgur.com/pDsy0Xq

I mean, if you _actually_ want people to be mad at you could just say that Malicious Metal is garbage at Mordekaiser and become so violently homophobic that you literally ruin every post you comment on that anyone posts about any ship ever. But that would be what you would call "totally uncool".
The key to not get mad, is to not love anything to begin with
Oh yes, being a heretic has its perks ;)
Indeed Friend, Indeed
Tut tut cheerio no lads shall thine sires b provoked to burn all thyme witches ðŸ˜†

Not really a problem here
step 9, go to the mob in gameplay with a different opinion.
Step 12,  my friend, but would you care to elaborate?

a mob on the gameplay boards, like the anti dyna or anti zed groups, with an opinion in support of or in a neutral state of.

example, thinking zed is meh. the mob of anti zed will get very mad at you.

I didn't' even touch the upvote switch because (A. Garen dies=Upvote (B. Tristana dies=Emotional Rollercoaster (C. I don't ship half of those=Downvote

**_LOGIC_**

When in Doubt


**UPVOTE** Let's get to the HOT PAGE, be funny
